remarks: The distance function is a function on the base set.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imasbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasbas.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasbas.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasds.e $e |- E = ( dist ` R ) $.
imasds.d $e |- D = ( dist ` U ) $.
imasdsfn $p |- ( ph -> D Fn ( B X. B ) ) $.
